It could be that we are mixing different things here:

* One is the [Runtime Windows library, handled using the `/Md` flag](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-US/en-en/library/2kzt1wy3.aspx?f=255&MSPPError=-2147217396) and in boost, the [flag is `Boost_USE_STATIC_RUNTIME`](http://www.cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.0/module/FindBoost.html).
* The other different thing is how we want MSVC to link against boost libraries, controlled by the flag in this PR `Boost_USE_STATIC_LIBS`.

I see no problem into choosing static or dynamic linking for boost, most of boost are just headers.
